name: Hotel Barcelo Solymar Arenas Blancas

reviews.text: I stayed at Solymar march 26-april 2. The hotel is beautiful, the food is great. The Cuban a la cart was the best meal ever!!!! Everyone has to try a Miami Vice the greatest drink ever....
reviews.title: Great beach!!!!

reviews.text: Our room was always cleaned the staff is great, some friendlier then others.... This is my second time in Varadero the last time i stayed at Club Amigo Varadero, I think i prefer a smaller resort. Barcelo Solymar is a larger resort and not as personable as i would like.
reviews.title: Fantastic Vacation!

likes.liked: — Within walking distance of Varadero...and gorgeous beach

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I'm a repeat guest of the Barcelo Solymar, and have just returned from another visit to this resort. I must say that the food is greatly improved! Here's a brief rundown of my views.
reviews.title: Great Holiday

reviews.text: Hotel room: We had an oceanview room on the 3rd floor. Althought the room is very basic, it was always clean and tidy. Our maid came to the door every morning to see if we needed any restocking for our mini fridge, which was always stocked with bottled water, pop and beer. We always had hot water for showers, and lots of towels.
reviews.title: Beautiful Resort - depends on what you're looking for

reviews.text: Beach: What can I say...it's the nicest stretch of beach in Varadero. Lots of palapas for shade and loads of beach chairs available. The water was rough for a few days, but still a beautiful shade of turquoise with soft sand. The water temperature was actually warmer than the pools.
reviews.title: Charlene of New Brunswick Canada

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The end of Feb. first few days of March were fantastic. This was our first trip to Cuba and we are so happy we chose the Solymar. We are big Dominican vacationers and we thought there were no nicer people in the world,, til we met the Cubans. The resort is great. Like anywhere else in the world you may want to travel, , just keep an open mind and remember where you are, chill, and you'll be fine.
reviews.title: First but not Last

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We will be back for sure. It's going to be difficult to try somewhere else on the island after Varadero , but there are some great reviews from all over Cuba. We'll have to decide.
reviews.title: Barcelo Solymar was a great holiday

likes.disliked: — Being short changed regularly while in town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Barcelo Solymar from Mar 1 to Mar 15 and had a terrific holiday. Never having been in Cuba before, we were unsure what to expect but we need not have worried.
reviews.title: Barcelo Solymar/Diving/Havana/Cigar Tour info
Loved those waiters!
reviews.text: The hotel was excellent. We stayed in one of the one bedroom bungalows and while it was not state of the art, it was spacious, quiet, clean and in a great location.
The gardens and layout of the hotel was beautiful and the beach and the colur of the sea was like a paradise.
reviews.title: overall good resort

reviews.text: Just got back from our second stay at the Solymar, April 14-21. Thankfully, not much has changed since our last visit. Everything was just great, the staff, the food, and of course the beach. The weather was perfect the entire week. A little windy at times, but the sun was always shinning. We are so glad we did the Solymar again. Met some wonderful people from Toronto and England. Raul at the lobby bar took good care of us every nite with the most amazing cappucinos. Really a top notch hotel.
reviews.title: Gracias RAUL!

reviews.text: Overall, a relaxing and warm week. Cuba is lovely and can't wait to return again.
reviews.title: Excellent Holiday

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for the last 2 weeks in March 2007. After a long flight and transfer from London we arrived at the hotel in the evening and were checked straight in to our rooms. Service was quick although we were not given an upgrade as described in the Virgin holiday brochure and the check in staff were unaware of it.
reviews.title: Get what you pay for....

likes.disliked: — Staff - and Jeep off road tour

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was of a good quality although there were small maintenance/ housekeeping issues that could have had more attention paid towards them, eg marks on walls, chipped paint, lightbulbs not working. Our maid was very friendly and we left gifts of colouring books, felt tips, tablets, shampoos etc each day for her.
reviews.title: Fantastic 40th from Cumbernauld
Great Time at the Solymar!
reviews.text: The public areas of the hotel are very nice except for the toilets in the main lobby that are very very smelly!

We Stayed at the barcelo Solymar hotel from the 5th august till the 19th august. The hotel is nice but has its downfalls. I have 2 children (13 and 11) and they were bored by the end of the first week. There is 2 pools and they are ok, and the rooms are average. But they is next to no entertainment on at all the daytime isnt to bad because your around the pool but at night there is nothing to do. The is 1 show on every night but is very boring and in a boiling hot room and has no air con so gets horrible as more people come in. The beaches are excellent and there are all different things you can do on the beach. And i will say to smokers take cigs which you because they only sell there own out there and they are very strong. They did sell cigs going out to cuba on my plane. I personly will not never go back to cuba as me and my family found it very boring
reviews.title: The Beaches in cuba are out of this world

reviews.text: Loved it !!! Stayed at Barcelo April 5-12. My hubby, myself and 17 yrs old twins.
reviews.title: Wonderful Experience !!!

reviews.text: Room: We had #1163 and 1161. Did not have ocean view but did not spend a lot of time in rooms anyways. I would suggest staying in a room away from lobby bar it can get very noisy. I had heard about this so I brought earplgs (the ones for noise) and we slept like babies. Our rooms were very clean, lots of toilet paper, clean towels, and towel "art". The hairdyers worked well and safe is in room for passports etc..
reviews.title: Where is Miss Solymar?

likes.disliked: — sheets should have been changed daily, and elevators should have worked better

reviews.text: Resort: Beautiful. Pool was cleaned every day, food was excellent, plenty of choices. How anyone can complain about lack of variety or bland is beyond me. They do not use a lot of spices but they do use eg.lemon juice, sauces and salt & pepper on each table. Every meal there is chicken, pork, fish, beef, salads, cheeses, pasta, breads, soups, etc.. We had 2 servers Kristine & Luis who were wonderful. We did not do any of the a la cartes since we all enjoyed the buffet so much. If you want to do the Italian a la carte, men have to wear pants and ladies must dress up a bit. The seafood a la carte always seemed to have a funny smell to it and since it is open, there are flies and cats.
reviews.title: Amazing..

likes.disliked: — Varadero is nothing like real cuba

reviews.title: cuba was awesome, hotel could have been better
reviews.text: The beach is the most beautiful we have ever seen. The sand is like flour, the water is clear, tourquise. If you want a spot with some shade, suggest you go down before 9am and put some towels on loungers to reserve your spot. There is music on beach which you can listen to or go the other side where it is quieter. The banana boat rides are free before 11am, paddle boats, kayaks, volleyball games, excercise lessons on beach and water, dance lessons. For times of lessons look at board just outside the doors for buffet. We had 1 day we couldn't go in ocean (they will put up red flags) due to high waves and jellyfish.

description: The hotel Barceló Solymar***** stands on right on the sea front of the top spot of Varadero beach, Cuba's best-known tourist destination.With a privileged setting just a few metres from the city centre, this exclusive resort, surrounded by beautiful gardens, offers a wide variety of services characterised by the excellent Barceló All-Inclusive programme.Highly recommended for families, couples and those who enjoy diving and water activities in general.Guests at the Barceló Solymar and Barceló Arenas Blancas hotels can enjoy the facilities at either hotel.
